message: Let's split the money. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a good deal for you in the first round, considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation, you'll lose 20% of the value if we go to the next round. This is a fair offer.
I understand the inflation is working against me, but your previous offer was unacceptable. This is my counter-offer. Let's be reasonable and close the deal.
